# thetalake_audit_logs (Data Source)

Theta Lake Audit Logs Data Source. Retrieves a list of audit logs.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_audit_logs" "example" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `logs` (List of Object) List of audit logs (see below for nested schema)

<a id="nestedatt--logs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `logs`

Read-Only:

- `action` (String) Action performed
- `id` (String) Log ID
- `resource` (String) Resource affected
- `timestamp` (String) Timestamp of the action
- `user` (String) User who performed the action
